entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023
